titleStmt.title: The doctrine of the Church of England, established by Parliament against disobedience and wilfull rebellion. Published by G. I. for satisfaction to his parishoners of Watton in the county of Hartford.
titleStmt.author: Ingoldsby, William, d. 1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Sheares at the signe of the Bible in Coven-Garden,
